subsection.name: Hippo Repository
subsection.p: The Hippo Repository is build on top of Apache Jackrabbit. The Hippo Repository adds extra fuctionality to the default Jackrabbit distribution while keeping full compliance with the JCR 1.0 JSR 170. The main added features are facets, virtual nodes and workflow.

subsection.name: Hippo CMS
subsection.p: Hippo CMS is a user-friendly content management system for maintaining all your information in a structured publication on Internet, intranet or extranet. The key points of Hippo CMS are user-friendliness, interoperability and expandability.

subsection.name: Hippo Portal
subsection.p: ippo Portal allows partners, employees and customers to chose their user experience, with personalized applications based on role, context, actions, location, preferences and team collaboration needs. Hippo Portal software provides a composite application or business mashup framework and the advanced tooling needed to build flexible, SOA-based solutions, as well as the unmatched scalability required by any size organization.

subsection.name: Hippo Sample Applications
subsection.p: The Hippo Sample Application are included to show the possibilities of Hippo ECM. The sample applications can be used as an example for and starting of the development of third party application that want to integrate with Hippo ECM. The sample application can also be used out of the box.
